availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susan Cox Martin in Shelby County, Kentucky, on December 17, 1823. Father of Welton O. Martin, Milton Ray Martin, F.L. Martin, Erdelia Martin, Florella D. Martin, and Ellen Martin. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 840.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Murrys Precinct, p. 225B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film 000259283, p. 352.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Daviess County Wills, vol. A-D, 1812-1896, p. 65.
